service.name: generateQRCodeImage
service.description: Generate a QRCode image according to

attribute.name: useLogo
attribute.description: SCIPIO: Explicit logo enable (stock did not permit false). Default: true

attribute.name: ecLevel
attribute.description: SCIPIO: Error correction level. Possible values: L, M, Q, H. Default: from qrcode.properties

attribute.name: logoImageSize
attribute.description: SCIPIO: Logo image target size. Supports formats such as: 100%, 50%, 100x100, 80%x80% NOTE: Aspect ratio is never changed; two dimensions mean two limits.

attribute.name: logoImageMaxSize
attribute.description: SCIPIO: Logo image max size. Supports formats such as: 100%, 50%, 100x100, 80%x80% NOTE: Aspect ratio is never changed; two dimensions mean two limits.

attribute.name: scalingOptions
attribute.description: SCIPIO: Scaling options; scalerName can name a scaler from imageops.properties.
